level.heading: Creation of the Howard Theatre Redevelopment Project TIF Area.
level.text: There is hereby established the Howard Theatre Redevelopment Project TIF Area, which shall consist of the following real property:
Lot 90, Square 441 (with a street address of 620 T Street, N.W.);
Lot 807, Square 441 (with a street address of 1830 Wiltberger Street, N.W.); and

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 4 of Howard Theatre Redevelopment project Great Streets Initiative Tax Increment Financing Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-516, August 3, 2010, 57 DCR 7971).

For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 4 of Howard Theatre Redevelopment Project Great Streets Initiative Tax Increment Financing Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-573, October 19, 2010, 57 DCR 10090).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-275, see notes under ยง 2-1217.34a.
